intro: Ervatamia lifuana, commonly known as the Lifuana thornveld, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its upright growth habit and spiny stems. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in dense clusters, which bloom during the cooler months. Ervatamia lifuana is typically found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid conditions. It is often used in landscaping due to its hardy nature and unique appearance.
